TopicTitle: Show and Tell - New LANTR engine

Articles.Content: Thanks for the info about that mod, I followed that mod's thread so any further stuff I want to say about it will be posted over there and not here.

On 7/29/2021 at 2:28 PM, SciMan said:

Basically, I want to be able to make THIS "Liberty Ship" SSTO, but in Kerbal scale.

so after seeing this link and going all the way down to the bottom of the page, here's my second suggestion: "the nuclear lightbulb/NLB"

the description would read: "if placed correctly, will emit light*

*warranty void if used to produce light"

For VTOLs on bodies with oxygen, it would be nice to have RCS thrusters be able to run off of electricity and intake air, that way you don't have to carry around monopropellant or oxidizer if you're just building an "in-atmosphere only" VTOL that's powered by jets and not helicopter blades.

SUPERNERVA (Speedy Ultra Pricey Experimental Navigational Engine for Racing or Vast Adventures) (or Vast Adventuring)

Edited September 8, 2021 by BekfastDerp13
Three month later the textures are ready
This is clearly an engine designed for most scenarios. Curious how usefull it will be and if it can compete well with more traditional and/or specified engines.

Exactly. Also was reading through the mammoth II discussion, and saw a suggestion of a bath tub, and now it looks like a shampaign glass! But seriously, insanely cool, cannot wait to see the KSP 2 in all it’s glory after the full release!
